title: Lag spikes without the lag!?
body:
Hey guys,

For the last few days I have been experiencing lag, although my MS stays at 25 in game... I am on a wired connection with fibreoptic broadband, with the modem right next to the PC and ping tests reading at around 19 when tested online. I have no idea what could be causing this issue, I have done all the basics, like re-set the modem, make league client high priority on task manager, and turn the graphics to low in-game, with no difference and the lag spikes continuing to happen. I game a lot, and have not experienced lag in any other game, other than league... 

Could anyone help with this issue...

Many Thanks

Nika (Vamporia) EUW

replies.body: It sounds like your might be experiencing some packet loss, which could be for a few reasons like your ISP's routing to the game server.  Run a[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your connection to figure out what's going on.  Should any results come up, you'll also find a list of steps to take specific for your issue.  Let me know what you find!

Please follow the steps (if there are any you haven't completed) on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

If those steps don't help, you can view your connection by running a traceroute, and sharing the results might show us where it's going wrong. I suggest downloading the [WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following EUW server IP's (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

> 185.40.65.1

and/or

> 162.249.72.1

Export the results to a text file and paste them here.
